General.Name: Tianjin Guifaxiang 18th Street Mahua Food Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Guifaxiang 18th Street Mahua Food Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of snack foods in China. It offers cakes, Tianjin-style instant foods, sweet chestnuts, traditional snacks, twists, pastries, convenience foods, and OEM products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
